description.message: Block leaks and spoilers about HoYoverse games on Bilibili, YouTube, Twitter, etc.

options_subtitle.message: Configure blocking rules and manage area settings

areas_subtitle.message: Manage blocking area settings for different platforms

area_home_enable.message: Find user element from document root

export_description.message: Export current configuration to JSON file

clear_warning.message: âš ï¸ This operation will clear all configuration and data, cannot be undone

about_description.message: This is a browser extension specifically designed for players of games under miHoYo (Hoyoverse), such as Genshin Impact, Honkai: Star Rail, Zenless Zone Zero, etc. It can automatically block content related to "leaks and smear campaigns" on major social platforms like Bilibili, YouTube, and Twitter (x.com).

about_thanks.message: Thanks: This project is refactored from the original Tampermonkey script developed by @å‡¡äº‘ on Bilibili. Thanks to the original author for the open source contribution!

usage_1.message: After installing the extension, a blue floating button will appear on the right side of the page

usage_2.message: Click the browser toolbar icon to quickly toggle the blocking function

usage_3.message: Click the floating button or right-click menu to enter the "Options" page

usage_4.message: Customize keywords, blacklist/whitelist, areas, etc. in the settings page
